meanings.definition: A mineral that is a type of gemstone, typically yellowish-brown in color.
meanings.sent1: She admired the beautiful topaz in her necklace.
meanings.sent2: The topaz sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The topaz gemstone seemed to wink at her playfully.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes lit up like topaz when she saw the stunning gem.
meanings.sent5: The topaz gemstone glowed with a warm, golden hue.

meanings.sent1: The walls were painted in a soothing topaz shade.
meanings.sent2: She wore a dress in a lovely topaz color.
meanings.sent3: The topaz hue of the sky at sunset was breathtaking.
meanings.sent4: The fields stretched out under a topaz sky.
meanings.sent5: The topaz color of the leaves in autumn was stunning.
